body_html:
Do you have cuda-9.0 or cuda 9.2?
I tried those commands and same for others but finally I got this:
WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in CPU only mode.
WARNING:root:Debug message: /usr/local/cuda-9.2/lib64/libcurand.so.9.0: version `libcurand.so.9.0' not found (required by /home/samira/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/caffe2/python/caffe2_pybind11_state_gpu.so)
Segmentation fault (core dumped)

body:
Do you have cuda-9.0 or cuda 9.2?
I tried those commands and same for others but finally I got this:
WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in CPU only mode.
WARNING:root:Debug message: /usr/local/cuda-9.2/lib64/libcurand.so.9.0: version `libcurand.so.9.0' not found (required by /home/samira/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/caffe2/python/caffe2_pybind11_state_gpu.so)
Segmentation fault (core dumped)
